meanings.definition: The quality or state of being intricate.
meanings.sent1: The intricateness of the puzzle amazed me.
meanings.sent2: The intricateness of the design required careful attention to detail.
meanings.sent3: The intricateness of the clockwork made it comically difficult to repair.
meanings.sent4: The intricateness of the spider's web was a masterpiece of nature's artistry.
meanings.sent5: The intricateness of the snowflake was breathtaking in its delicate beauty.

meanings.definition: The complexity or intricacy of something.
meanings.sent1: The intricateness of the plot kept me guessing until the end.
meanings.sent2: The intricateness of the machinery required a skilled technician to operate it.
meanings.sent3: The intricateness of the recipe made it a fun challenge to cook.
meanings.sent4: The intricateness of the relationship between the characters added depth to the story.
meanings.sent5: The intricateness of the map made it difficult to navigate through the maze.
